column2: Their  Lordships,  in  delivering  the  judgment  of  Jayagoda  &  Another  v

column1: Attorney General  (supra)  have considered  the  scope  of  the  Sections  425(1)  and

column2: 425(4)  extensively as well as the relevant authoritative judicial precedents on that

column1: point.  This  Court  respectfully  agrees  with

column2: judgment as  a judicial  precedent which  had laid  down  the legal  principles  that

column1: are applicable in an application under Section 425.
